oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Corner stone laying, King College, Bristol, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted and enhanced photographs of a cornerstone laying ceremony and the completed building at King College in Bristol, Tennessee. Features a divided back and narrative on reverse. There is typed correspondence and an April 18, 1954 postmark on reverse as well.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Universities & colleges; Building dedications
